fn.p: There were no external funding sources for this study.
This study is not associated with any thesis or dissertation work.

p.bold: Ethics approval and consent to participate

fn.p: This study was approved by the Ethics Committee of the Hospital de São José de Doenças Infecciosas under the protocol number 2.405.527. All the procedures in this study were in accordance with the 1975 Helsinki Declaration, updated in 2013.

Conception and design of the research: Farias LABG, Beserra FLCN, Fernandes L, Teixeira AAR, Girão ES, Pires Neto RJ; Acquisition of data: Farias LABG, Beserra FLCN, Fernandes L, Teixeira AAR, Ferragut JM, Pires Neto RJ; Analysis and interpretation of the data: Ferragut JM, Girão ES, Pires Neto RJ; Statistical analysis: Pires Neto RJ; Writing of the manuscript: Farias LABG, Beserra FLCN, Fernandes L, Teixeira AAR, Pires Neto RJ; Critical revision of the manuscript for intellectual content: Ferragut JM, Girão ES, Pires Neto RJ.
No potential conflict of interest relevant to this article was reported.
